title: How to Draw a Cute Kawaii Face (Girl)

steps.title: Start by drawing two little oval (vertical) eyes.
steps.content: Start by drawing two little oval (vertical) eyes. Make sure they are at least one centimeter apart from each other.

steps.title: Draw a little mouth beneath the eyes next.
steps.content: Draw a little mouth beneath the eyes next. The mouth shouldn't be far from the eyes.

steps.title: Add some little freckles/dimples/spots.
steps.content: Add some little freckles/dimples/spots. Add three little dots on both sides of the mouth.

steps.title: Draw eyelashes on top of the eyes.
steps.content: Draw eyelashes on top of the eyes. Add 3. Make them a little short.

steps.title: Add a final touch.
steps.content: Add a final touch. Go up about a centimeter above the eyes, and to the left draw a little bow.
